title: What Brokerages Made Of Can Fin Homes’ Q1 Performance
description: The company’s Q1 PAT of Rs 183 crore was 7% ahead of Jefferies’ estimate on better-than-expected NIM and lower operating expenses.

title: Buy Can Fin Homes; target of Rs 900: HDFC Securities
description: HDFC Securities is bullish on Can Fin Homes has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 900 in its research report dated July 20, 2023.

title: Can Fin Homes says employees committed nearly Rs 38.53 cr fraud
description: India’s Can Fin Homes Ltd on Tuesday said employees at one of its branches had committed fraud of nearly Rs 38.53 crore ($4.7 million) by transferring funds to different personal bank accounts.

title: Can Fin Homes says employees committed financial fraud of ₹38.53 crore
description: Can Fin Homes Limited discovers ₹38.53 crore fraud committed by Ambala branch employees. Fraud detected on July 24, 2023. One-time impact on profitability, no impact on assets/asset quality. FIR lodged with Jurisdictional Police. Necessary reports to be submitted to authorities. Incident isolated to…

title: Can Fin falls 9% after Rs 38 crore fraud - Times of India
description: International Business News: Can Fin Homes stock fell over 9% on Wednesday after the company reported an over Rs 38-crore internal fraud to stock exchanges.
